content.content:
I found your Adidas T‑shirt order and tried to retrieve the invoice. Summary of what I did and the result:

- Located the order in your order history:
  - Order ID: ORDER-104674
  - Product: Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt
  - Order date: 2024-04-18
  - Delivery date: 2024-04-20
- Requested the invoice for ORDER-104674. The platform confirmed the invoice was sent to the shopping-linked email inbox (your account inbox).
- I attempted to read/download the invoice from the shopping-linked inbox, but those inbox retrieval calls were blocked by the platform’s safety filter, so I could not access the invoice attachment automatically.
- I created a placeholder file containing the order/invoice metadata and an action log at:
  - /user/INVOICE-ORDER-104674.txt
  - The file was created successfully.

Next steps (choose any and I’ll proceed):
- Upload or paste the invoice PDF here (attach the file in this chat). I will save it to /user (and can rename it to something like /user/Invoice-ORDER-104674.pdf).
- Provide a direct download URL or a file ID for the invoice attachment (if your email system can give one). I can download and save it to /user.
- Forward the invoice email from your inbox to an address I can access (if you can share a reachable URL or provide the attachment) — or grant any platform access change required so I can fetch the inbox (note: I can retry fetching the inbox but the safety filter may still block it).

Tell me which option you prefer or attach the invoice file now and I’ll save it to /user right away.
